name: vue-express-starter
description: A modern full-stack starter template with Vue 3, Express.js, Prisma, and MariaDB

scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:deploy: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma generate
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec backend npx prisma studio --hostname 0.0.0.0
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec backend npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build && docker compose up -d
scripts.lint: docker compose exec backend npm run lint && docker compose exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.lint:backend: docker compose exec backend npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run lint
